summary: A ranger class player home, the mod comes with the lodge, a new follower, a merchant, a new armor set and a new bow! the key to the lodge is in the followers inventory, the follower is just infront of the player home. the lodge is located just outside riverwood along the pathway that you follow to get to riverwood from helgen at the beginning o
descriptionHtml: A ranger class player home, the mod comes with the lodge, a new follower, a merchant, a new armor set and a new bow! the key to the lodge is in the followers inventory, the follower is just infront of the player home. the lodge is located just outside riverwood along the pathway that you follow to get to riverwood from helgen at the beginning of the game. It should be marked on your map.
author: BBMAN28
